DOC.brief_summary: Dietary fat show modulate cholesterol fatty acid homeostasis several line evidence suggest effect associate change regulation different gene intestine level involve cholesterol fatty acid metabolism pathway . The present study examine impact short-term high fat diet versus short-term low fat diet expression Niemann-Pick C1-like 1 ( NPC1L1 ) , adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) bind cassette transporter ( ABCG5/8 ) , microsomal triglyceride transfer protein ( MTP ) fatty acid transport protein-4 ( FATP4 ) , show play critical role intestinal cholesterol absorption , chylomicron synthesis dietary lipid absorption . Gene expression study perform duodenal biopsy . The primary hypothesis short-term high fat diet significantly decrease duodenal messenger ribonucleic acid ( mRNA ) level NPC1L1 , ABCG5/8 , MTP FATP4 compare short-term low fat diet .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Short-Term High Fat Low Fat Diet Intestinal Genes Expression Involved Cholesterol Fatty Acid Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Males 18 50 year age Nonsmoker Body mass index 20.0 30.0 kg/m2 Plasma LDLcholesterol level 25th 75th percentile age day 14 Plasma triglyceride level < 1.7 mmol/L ( 150 mg/dl ) day 14 Plasma HDLcholesterol level 0.9 ( 35 mg/dl ) 1.6 mmol/L ( 60 mg/dl ) day 14 Subjects must willing give write informed consent able adhere diet schedule visit schedule Patients otherwise healthy , without elevation hepatic transaminase creatine kinase ( CK ) abnormal renal function coagulation Patients extreme dyslipidemias , familial hypercholesterolemia exclude Subjects exclude cardiovascular disease ( CHD , cerebrovascular disease peripheral arterial disease ) take medication know affect lipoprotein metabolism ( eg . steroid , beta blocker , thiazide diuretic , lipid lower agent , significant alcohol intake etc . )
